verses.name: Leviticus 25:46
verses.text: And ye shall take them as an inheritance for your children after you, to inherit them for a possession; they shall be your bondmen for ever: but over your brethren the children of Israel, ye shall not rule one over another with rigour.

verses.name: Leviticus 25:47
verses.text: And if a sojourner or stranger wax rich by thee, and thy brother that dwelleth by him wax poor, and sell himself unto the stranger or sojourner by thee, or to the stock of the stranger’s family:

verses.name: Leviticus 25:48
verses.text: After that he is sold he may be redeemed again; one of his brethren may redeem him:
